geometry::traits::dimension

geometry::traits::dimension< P > Struct Template Reference
[Concepts: concept definitions]

dimension metafunction, used by concept Point to check if pointtype has an enumeration which defines the number of dimensions More...

Detailed Description

template<typename P>
struct geometry::traits::dimension< P >

dimension metafunction, used by concept Point to check if pointtype has an enumeration which defines the number of dimensions

  • This is one of the metafunctions defining a Point concept
  • Metafunctions normally have a primary definition, in namespace traits, and a const agnostic version, in namespace support
  • It is usually not used by the library user. If legacy points or other points are used it might be necessary to override these functions
